info.description: API pour le projet PEC2 Backend
info.title: API PEC2 Backend

post.description: Create a new category with the provided information

put.description: Update a category with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a category by its ID

post.description: Submit a new contact request with the provided information

201.description: message: Contact request submitted successfully, id: contact ID

get.description: Retrieves a list of all contact requests (Admin access only)

patch.description: Update the status of a contact request (Admin access only)

401.description: error: Wrong credentials or email not verified

get.description: Retrieve all posts with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new post with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve a post by its ID

put.description: Update a post with the provided information

delete.description: Delete a post by its ID

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information

201.description: message: User created successfully, email: user email

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users (Admin access only)

put.description: Update user's password by verifying the old password and setting a new one

get.description: Get the current authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update the current authenticated user's profile information with optional profile picture

200.description: message: Profile updated successfully, user: updated user object

get.description: Get count of users by month or year

parameters.description: Year to filter by (default is current year)
parameters.name: year

parameters.description: Month to filter by (1-12, only used with 'month' filter)
parameters.name: month

get.description: After create account, user valid it email

parameters.description: JWT Token sent in the URL
parameters.name: token

401.description: error: user not found or can't decode JWT
